subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With his troubled adolescence behind him, Caron Butler has averaged 20.4 points and 7.7 rebounds in his fifth N.B.A. season, helping the Wizards to the third-best record in the Eastern Conference.
snippet: With his troubled adolescence behind him, Caron Butler has averaged 20.4 points and 7.7 rebounds in his fifth N.B.A. season, helping the Wizards to the third-best record in the Eastern Conference.
